00023 #include <Champ_front_xyz_debit.h>
00024 #include <Param.h>

00031 Implemente_instanciable(Champ_front_xyz_debit,"Champ_front_xyz_debit",Champ_front_normal);
00032 // XD champ_front_xyz_debit front_field_base champ_front_xyz_debit 1 This field is used to define a flow rate field with a velocity profil which will be normalized to match the flow rate chosen.
00033 
00034 Sortie& Champ_front_xyz_debit::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00035 {
00036   return Champ_front_normal::printOn(os);
00037 }

00039 
00040 Entree& Champ_front_xyz_debit::readOn(Entree& is)
00041 {
00042   Param param(que_suis_je());
00043   param.ajouter("velocity_profil", &velocity_profil_, Param::OPTIONAL); //!< XD_ADD_P front_field_base velocity_profil 0 velocity field to define the profil of velocity.
00044   param.ajouter("flow_rate", &flow_rate_, Param::REQUIRED); //!<  XD_ADD_P front_field_base flow_rate 1 uniform field in space to define the flow rate. It could be, for example, champ_front_uniforme, ch_front_input_uniform or champ_front_fonc_t
00045   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00046   fixer_nb_comp(dimension * flow_rate_.nb_comp());
00047   return is;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int Champ_front_xyz_debit::initialiser(double tps, const Champ_Inc_base& inco)
00051 {
00052 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::initialiser" << finl;
00053   if (!Champ_front_normal::initialiser(tps,inco))
00054     return 0;
00055   const Front_VF& le_bord= ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00056   flow_rate_.valeur().initialiser(tps,inco);
00057   if ( !sub_type(Champ_front_uniforme,flow_rate_.valeur()) && !sub_type(Ch_front_input_uniforme,flow_rate_.valeur()) && !sub_type(Champ_front_t,flow_rate_.valeur()) && !sub_type(Champ_front_Tabule,flow_rate_.valeur()))
00058     {
00059       Cerr << "\nError in Champ_front_xyz_debit::initialiser() \nflow_rate must be of type champ_front_uniforme, ch_front_input_uniforme, champ_front_tabule or champ_front_fonc_t!" << finl;
00060       exit();
00061     }
00062   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00063     {
00064       velocity_profil_.valeur().initialiser(tps,inco);
00065       if (velocity_profil_.valeur().nb_comp()!=dimension)
00066         {
00067           Cerr << "\nError in Champ_front_xyz_debit::initialiser() \nvelocity_profil must have " << dimension << " components!" << finl;
00068           exit();
00069         }
00070     }
00071   initialiser_coefficient(inco, tps);
00072 
00073 // For tabular sizing only
00074   normal_vectors_=les_valeurs[0].valeurs();
00075   integrale_.resize(flow_rate_.valeur().valeurs().line_size());
00076   DoubleTab velocity_user;
00077   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00078     velocity_user=velocity_profil_.valeur().valeurs();
00079   calculer_normales_et_integrale(le_bord,velocity_user);
00080 
00081 // the flow rate Q_user and the velocity profil U_user are imposed on the boundary
00082 // so the velocity field u is computed as following :
00083 // u = ( Q_user U_user n)/ Integrale( U_user . n dS)
00084 // where n is the normal vector associated to the boundary
00085 
00086 // fill at every time
00087   int nb_cases=les_valeurs->nb_cases(); //!< cases number of the wheel
00088   for (int t=0; t<nb_cases; t++)
00089     {
00090       DoubleTab& velocity_field=les_valeurs[t].valeurs(); //!< values of the field at time t, type Roue_ptr
00091       calculer_champ_vitesse(le_bord, velocity_field, velocity_user, tps);
00092     }
00093   return 1;
00094 }
00095 
00096 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::calculer_normales_et_integrale(const Front_VF& le_bord, DoubleTab& velocity_user)
00097 {
00098   const int N = flow_rate_.nb_comp();
00099   const Zone_VF& zone_VF = ref_cast(Zone_VF,zone_dis());
00100   integrale_ = 0.;
00101 
00102   for(int i = 0; i < le_bord.nb_faces_tot(); i++)
00103     {
00104       int f = le_bord.num_face(i);
00105       const double dS = zone_VF.face_surfaces(f);
00106       for (int n = 0; n < N; ++n)
00107         {
00108           double u_scal_n = 0;
00109           for(int j = 0; j < dimension; j++)
00110             {
00111               normal_vectors_(i, j) = -zone_VF.normalized_boundaries_outward_vector(f, 1.)(j); //!< inward normal
00112               u_scal_n += normal_vectors_(i, j) * (velocity_user.size() ? velocity_user(velocity_user.size() > dimension ? i : 0, j) : normal_vectors_(i, j));
00113             }
00114           if (i < le_bord.nb_faces()) integrale_(n) += dS * u_scal_n / coeff_(i, n) * zone_VF.porosite_face(f); //real faces only
00115         }
00116     }
00117   for (int n = 0; n < N; ++n)
00118     integrale_(n) = mp_sum(integrale_(n));
00119 }
00120 
00121 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::initialiser_coefficient(const Champ_Inc_base& inco, double tps)
00122 {
00123   const Front_VF& le_bord = ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00124   coeff_.resize(le_bord.nb_faces_tot(), flow_rate_.nb_comp());
00125   coeff_ = 1.;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::calculer_champ_vitesse(const Front_VF& le_bord, DoubleTab& velocity_field, DoubleTab& velocity_user, double temps)
00129 {
00130   const int N = flow_rate_.nb_comp();
00131 
00132   for(int i = 0; i < le_bord.nb_faces_tot(); i++) for (int n = 0; n < N; ++n) for(int j = 0; j < dimension; j++)
00133         {
00134           double v_mult = flow_rate_.valeur().valeurs_au_temps(temps)(0, n) / integrale_(n) ; //the profile/normals must be multiplied by this to get the correct inward flow
00135           double n_mult = flow_rate_alone_ ? normal_vectors_(i,j) : (velocity_user(velocity_user.size() > dimension ? i : 0, j));
00136           velocity_field(i, N * j + n) = v_mult * n_mult;
00137         }
00138 }
00139 
00140 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::associer_fr_dis_base(const Frontiere_dis_base& fr)
00141 {
00142   flow_rate_.valeur().associer_fr_dis_base(fr);
00143 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::associer_fr_dis_base flow_rate_alone_ " << flow_rate_alone_ << finl;
00144   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00145     velocity_profil_.valeur().associer_fr_dis_base(fr);
00146   Champ_front_normal::associer_fr_dis_base(fr);
00147 }

00149 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::set_temps_defaut(double temps)
00150 {
00151 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::set_temps_defaut" << finl;
00152   flow_rate_.valeur().set_temps_defaut(temps);
00153   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00154     velocity_profil_.valeur().set_temps_defaut(temps);
00155   Champ_front_normal::set_temps_defaut(temps);
00156 }
00157 
00158 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::fixer_nb_valeurs_temporelles(int nb_cases)
00159 {
00160 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::fixer_nb_valeurs_temporelles" << finl;
00161   flow_rate_.valeur().fixer_nb_valeurs_temporelles(nb_cases);
00162   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00163     velocity_profil_.valeur().fixer_nb_valeurs_temporelles(nb_cases);
00164   Champ_front_normal::fixer_nb_valeurs_temporelles(nb_cases);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::changer_temps_futur(double temps,int i)
00168 {
00169 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::changer_temps_futur" << finl;
00170   Champ_front_normal::changer_temps_futur(temps,i);
00171   flow_rate_.valeur().changer_temps_futur(temps,i);
00172   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00173     velocity_profil_.valeur().changer_temps_futur(temps,i);
00174 }

00176 //
00177 //! Turn the wheel of the CL
00178 int Champ_front_xyz_debit::avancer(double temps)
00179 {
00180 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::avancer" << finl;
00181   Champ_front_normal::avancer(temps);
00182   if (flow_rate_.valeur().avancer(temps))
00183     if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00184       return velocity_profil_.valeur().avancer(temps);
00185     else
00186       return 1;
00187   else
00188     return 0;
00189 }
00190 
00191 //
00192 //! Turn the wheel of the CL
00193 int Champ_front_xyz_debit::reculer(double temps)
00194 {
00195 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::reculer" << finl;
00196   Champ_front_normal::reculer(temps);
00197   if (flow_rate_.valeur().reculer(temps))
00198     if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00199       return velocity_profil_.valeur().reculer(temps);
00200     else
00201       return 1;
00202   else
00203     return 0;
00204 }
00205 
00206 void Champ_front_xyz_debit::mettre_a_jour(double temps)
00207 {
00208 // Cerr << "Champ_front_xyz_debit::mettre_a_jour  temps = " << temps << finl;
00209   if (update_coeff_) update_coeff(temps);
00210   DoubleTab velocity_user;
00211 
00212   flow_rate_.valeur().mettre_a_jour(temps);
00213   if (!flow_rate_alone_)
00214     {
00215       velocity_profil_.valeur().mettre_a_jour(temps);
00216       velocity_user=velocity_profil_.valeur().valeurs_au_temps(temps);
00217     }
00218   else
00219     {
00220       velocity_user.resize(1,dimension);
00221       velocity_user=1;
00222     }
00223   if (update_coeff_) calculer_normales_et_integrale(ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis()),velocity_user);
00224   DoubleTab& velocity_field=valeurs_au_temps(temps); //!< values of the field at time t, type Roue_ptr
00225   const Front_VF& le_bord= ref_cast(Front_VF,frontiere_dis());
00226   if (velocity_field.size_array())
00227     calculer_champ_vitesse(le_bord, velocity_field, velocity_user, temps);
00228 }
